data.name: Star in the Hollow
data.detailed_description:
The Story

Star in the Hollow follows the story of a young girl, Kay, who finds herself alone in a massive cave with no memory of how she arrived there. Aided by a mysterious talking bird, she must find her way out of the cave, and hopefully, return to a family that she can’t even remember.


The game follows the pair’s adventure through this vast, beautiful underground world. However, all is not well within the world. There is a strange ghost child that haunts the young girl. A raging fire of unknown origin seeks to destroy all that it touches. Not to mention, the Spirit seems to be keeping secrets from the girl.

Even still, the Spirit promises to help the child find her way out. The question remains: what is to be found at the end of this world?

The Gameplay

Star in the Hollow can be played with one or two players, locally. Players will travel across over a dozen visually distinct and beautiful levels. Throughout the game, players will overcome platforming challenges while collecting Azuzzi Crystals that will aid in their progression. By collecting enough Azuzzi Crystals, players advance to future worlds and hopefully find the cave's end.


Even though Kay and the Spirit are strong together, they alone cannot get past every obstacle. Along their journey, they will have to speak with the locals of the area and ask for their help in their quest to find the exit of this massive cavern.

Features

  • Two playable characters with separate movesets
  • Over a dozen visually distinct and beautiful levels
  • Over a hundred Azuzzi Crystals to collect
  • A gripping story to experience
  • An original soundtrack
  • Lots of fun, quirky characters to meet
